name: Loch Siog (Skeptes)
description:
You're a child's sprit bound to the earth. Search for your memories and find the exit in the level.

You can click on the top left icon to see your memories.

Controls are Q and D to move, space to jump and S to smash.
Controller is also supported!

This is a school project at Isart Digital

We Made this game with 10 other great people:

Artists:

Élise Louget (ArtStation: https://www.artstation.com/elise_louguet)

itch: https://louis-m-s-aujard-catot.itch.io/)
